document_data.name: Drigor Bersk
document_data.deathnotes: [[Nightal 6]], decapitated by an [[ironwyrm golem]] at the ''[[dracorage mythal]]''
document_data.mainbody: '''Drigor Bersk''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Ilmater]] who fought by King [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]'s side in {{yearlink|1373}}. He was instrumental to ending the [[Rage of Dragons]].{{cite book/The Ruin||13}}
document_data.Description: With a scarred face and hulking physique, Drigor Bersk was a very unlikely priest of [[Ilmater]].{{cite book/The Ruin||11}}
document_data.Personality: Drigor Bersk was quite fatalistic and pessimistic.{{cite book/The Rite||Prologue}}
document_data.Abilities: Drigor was able to cast many spells, most likely ''[[aid]]'', ''[[blade barrier]]'', and ''[[searing light]]''. He claimed he could cast a restoring spell, likely ''[[restoration]]'', and to be more advanced in the mysteries than [[Pavel Shemov]]. He participated as one of the circle members of the Grand Divination on the [[Feast of the Moon]] during the council of wyrms in [[Thentia]]. During the siege of the ''[[dracorage mythal]]'' on [[Nightal 6]], he cast at least one barrier spell.
